snippet.title: Sega 32X Longplay [18] Rick Dangerous (Homebrew)
snippet.description:
http://www.longplays.org

Played by: SCHLAUCHI

A port of Rick Dangerous to the 32X - this port cannot be completed without cheating at 11:22, as otherwise you will always die at the spikes! In the original game and all the other xrick ports you do not die there! I assume this has something to do with how the 32X handles colissions.

Disclaimer: Most videos by World of Longplays use SaveStates!
